name: projection
description: A static site generator that creates a beautiful, interactive gallery to showcase your coding projects. Features search, filtering, dark theme, and responsive design.
author: Mike Delmonaco

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently "nodemon --watch projects.yaml --watch projects.json --exec npm run build" "browser-sync start --server dist --port 8080 --files 'dist/**/*' --no-notify"
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch projects.yaml --watch projects.json --exec npm run build
